question: Which of the following isnot an example of a biocultural approach?

answers.text: A biometric study on the effect of altitude on Tibetan monks who build monasteries in high mountain regions
A study of the waysbiology and culture affected the treatment of survivors of a nuclear accident that occurred in 2011 in Japan
A study on the impact of climate change and natural disasters on health and the migration and displacement of people
A study on how culture and tradition impact the health of women through rituals that mutilate and oppress women
